title: "Baidu-Geely EV Venture Hires Cadillac’s Former Lead Designer"
excerpt: "Jidu Auto, a smart electric vehicle joint venture between Chinese giants Baidu and Geely, has hired Frank Wu, Cadillac’s former lead exterior designer, to run its design studio, giving a boost to the newly born company’s ambition to grab a slice of China’s highly crowded EV market."
